content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sargsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/survey/annual-enterprise-survey-2023-financial-year-provisional-size-bands (1).csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
